description: Those who try to receive cannabis through the post should expect to be jailed, a deemster says.
title: Deemster warns of 'ridiculous' levels of cannabis being sent to Isle of Man
title_page: Deemster warns of 'ridiculous' levels of cannabis being sent to Isle of Man - BBC News
maintext: A "ridiculous" amount of cannabis is being illegally imported to the Isle of Man and a "message needs to be sent" that those involved will be jailed, a judge has said.
